{{html:
<div id="tabbable">
  <h2>My Machine Buckets</h2>
  <table id="machine_buckets_list"  class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <tr>
      <th>Status</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>IP Address</th>
      <th>Plan</th>
      <th>Main Region</th>
    </tr>
    <tbody>
      <tr ng-repeat="bucket in buckets">
        <td>{[bucket.status]}</td>
        <td>
          <a ng-href="#/edit/{[bucket.id]}">{[bucket.name]}</a>
        </td>
        <td>{[bucket.ip]}</td>
        <td>{[bucket.plan]}</td>
        <td>{[bucket.region]}</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>
}}
